title: Ticket #4762: Have per-user limits on scheduler and local universe jobs
description:
BMRB just had a situation where they ran into the scheduler universe job limit (which was not obvious (see #4757)). (It also turns out they didn't know about the limit at all.)

Anyhow, they want to have a limit, but what they really want is to have separate limits for different users. They obviously could do this by having separate schedds, but that seems like a lot of extra complexity to force users to deal with just to implement such limits.
